revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Decoration | name = Stalactite/stalagmite column bottom | class = CavePillarBottom | game = Strife | doomednum = 162 | convid = 220 }}[[Classes]]: CavePillarBottom
This actor must be placed exactly at the same place as its [[Classes:CavePillarTop|top counterpart]] in a cave area where the sector height is 128 units. Otherwise, it'll look odd. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR CavePillarBottom { {{Property|Radius}} 16 {{Property|Height}} 128 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: STLG E -1 Stop } }
